咕.definition: (onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc

咕咕叫.definition: sound made by an empty stomach

咕咚.definition: splash; (onom.) for heavy things falling down

咕噥.definition: to murmur; to mumble; to grumble; to mutter

咕嚕.definition: (onom.) to rumble (of a stomach); to coo (of a dove); rumbling; noisy drinking sound

咕攘.definition: to wriggle about; to move around
